channel.title: Making it so admins cant trade? [DELTA]
channel.description: just simple, how would i make it where admins + owner cant trade?

item.title: Making it so admins cant trade? [DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @birdman4657 birdman4657
item.description:
@birdman4657 wrote:

Ok… here we go

search for this in your client.java

if(other.interfaceOpened){

add this underneath it

if(other.playerRights == 2){ sM("Admins cannot trade."); return; } if(playerRights == 2){ sM("Admins cannot trade."); return;

for example… mine looks like this

if(other.interfaceOpened){ int EnemyX = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absX; int EnemyY = PlayerHandler.players[trade_reqId].absY; TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY); sM("Other player is busy at the moment."); return; } if(action == 1){ return; } if(other.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(playerName)){ sM("Other player is busy at the moment."); return; } if(other.action == 1){ return; } if(other.playerRights == 2){ sM("Admins cannot trade."); return; } if(playerRights == 2){ sM("Admins cannot trade."); return; }[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 25, 2009, 02:36:41 am[/size][hr]hope this helps

Read full topic
item.source: Making it so admins cant trade? [DELTA]
